name: Fuse Twap Bot
description: A multiplayer drawing game for the browser

ETHEREUM_ADMIN_ACCOUNT.description: Ethereum account that will post the prices to the oracle

ETHEREUM_ADMIN_PRIVATE_KEY.description: Private key of the account that will post the prices to the oracle

WEB3_HTTP_PROVIDER_URL.description: Your node provider URL. Infura or otherwise.

SUPPORTED_PAIRS.description: Comma-separated values of For example: '0x97c4adc5d28a86f9470c70dd91dc6cc2f20d2d4d|0xa0b86991c6218b36c1d19d4a2e9eb0ce3606eb48,0x088ee5007c98a9677165d78dd2109ae4a3d04d0c|0xc02aaa39b223fe8d0a0e5c4f27ead9083c756cc2' // FRAX/USDC (Uniswap), YFI/ETH (SushiSwap)

ROOT_PRICE_ORACLE_CONTRACT_ADDRESS.description: Root oracle address, can be fetched from rari's documentation page. Defaults to Rari's mainnet deployemnt
